categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This landspeeder was a repulsorlift vehicle owned by Watto on Tatooine. It was a sleek, thin-bodied speeder with a tall tail fin and side-mounted engines.

Prior to his fateful meeting with Qui-Gon Jinn and Padmé Amidala, Anakin Skywalker piloted Watto's landspeeder to a Jawa droid sale at Mochot Steep. On the return journey, Anakin encountered and assisted a wounded Tusken Raider.
